result.arabic_text: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
result.translation: Na msimfanyie kiburi Mwenyezi Mungu; hakika mimi nitakuleteeni uthibitisho ulio wazi.
result.footnotes: Wala msimfanyie kiburi Mwenyezi Mungu kwa kumkadhibisha Mtume wake, kwani mimi nakuleteeni muujiza ulio wazi wa kubainisha ukweli wa Unabii wangu na Utume wangu.
